lead_paragraph: REVOLTING INHUMANITY.--The following details of one of the most shocking barbarities committed in a community of civilized people, has seldom been equaled in the annals of crime. In Morgan county, not long ago, a citizen died, leaving a widow and two small children, the oldest a girl, about seven years of age. Not long after the death of her husband, the woman married again. Soon the girl died,
